bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is disabled

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is enabled

bit_field.name: SOSCCMRE
bit_field.description: System OSC Clock Monitor Reset Enable

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCMRE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Clock Monitor generates interrupt when error detected

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCMRE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Clock Monitor generates reset when error detected

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_LK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: This Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_LK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: This Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCVLD_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is not enabled or clock is not valid

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCVLD_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is enabled and output clock is valid

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCSEL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCSEL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is disabled or has not detected an error

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is enabled and detected an error

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_EREFS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Internal crystal oscillator of OSC selected.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_HGO_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Configure crystal oscillator for low-gain operation

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_HGO_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Configure crystal oscillator for high-gain operation

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_RANGE_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Low frequency range selected for the crystal oscillator

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_RANGE_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Medium frequency range selected for the crytstal oscillator

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_RANGE_0b11
bit_field_value.description: High frequency range selected for the crystal oscillator

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSTEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is disabled in supported Stop modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSTEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is enabled in supported Stop modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCLPEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is disabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCLPEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is enabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_LK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_LK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCVLD_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is not enabled or clock is not valid

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCVLD_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is enabled and output clock is valid

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSEL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSEL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCFG_RANGE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC low range clock (2 MHz)

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCFG_RANGE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC high range clock (8 MHz )

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_LK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_LK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCVLD_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is not enabled or clock is not valid.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCVLD_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is enabled and output clock is valid. The clock is valid once there is an output clock from the FIRC analog.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCSEL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCSEL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Error not detected with the Fast IRC trimming.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Error detected with the Fast IRC trimming.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCFG_RANGE_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is trimmed to 48 MHz

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLCM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System PLL Clock Monitor is disabled

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLCM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System PLL Clock Monitor is enabled

bit_field.name: SPLLCMRE
bit_field.description: System PLL Clock Monitor Reset Enable

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLCMRE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Clock Monitor generates interrupt when error detected

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLCMRE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Clock Monitor generates reset when error detected

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_LK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_LK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLVLD_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System PLL is not enabled or clock is not valid

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLVLD_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System PLL is enabled and output clock is valid

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLSEL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System PLL is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLSEL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System PLL is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System PLL Clock Monitor is disabled or has not detected an error

bit_field_value.name: SPLLCSR_SPLLERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System PLL Clock Monitor is enabled and detected an error. System PLL Clock Error flag will not set when System OSC is selected as its source and SOSCERR has set.
